Detailed Description
This class is used to fetch the Json configuration data for a single file extension. The Json configuration data is then used to create an Extension object.
Definition at line 11 of file Extension.java.

Constructor
Parameters
fileCategory
(String) the file category (e.g. "Documents")
fileExtension
(String) the file extension (e.g. "pdf")
configJsonObject
(JSONObject) the Json configuration data
Returns
(Extension) an Extension object
Exceptions
IllegalArgumentException
(IllegalArgumentException) if the file category or file extension is not found in the Json configuration data

void dev.filechampion.filechampion4j.Extension.setValuesFromJson (JSONObject configJsonObject)[private]
This method is used to set the values of the Extension object from the Json configuration data.
Parameters
configJsonObject
(JSONObject) the Json configuration data
Exceptions
IllegalArgumentException
if the file category or file extension is not found in the Json configuration data
Definition at line 95 of file Extension.java. 00095 { 00096 if (!configJsonObject.has(fileCategory)) { 00097 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Category not found in JSON: " + fileCategory); 00098 } 00099 JSONObject categoryJson = configJsonObject.optJSONObject(fileCategory); 00100 00101 if (!categoryJson.has(fileExtension)) { 00102 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Extension not found in JSON: " + fileExtension); 00103 } 00104 JSONObject extensionJson = categoryJson.optJSONObject(fileExtension); 00105 00106 this.extensionPlugins = extensionJson.optJSONArray("extension_plugins"); 00107 this.mimeType = extensionJson.optString("mime_type"); 00108 this.magicBytes = extensionJson.optString("magic_bytes"); 00109 this.headerSignatures = extensionJson.optString("header_signatures"); 00110 this.footerSignatures = extensionJson.optString("footer_signatures"); 00111 this.antivirusScanJson = extensionJson.optJSONArray("antivirus_scan"); 00112 this.changeOwnership = extensionJson.optBoolean("change_ownership"); 00113 this.changeOwnershipUser = extensionJson.optString("change_ownership_user"); 00114 this.changeOwnershipMode = extensionJson.optString("change_ownership_mode"); 00115 this.nameEncoding = extensionJson.optBoolean("name_encoding"); 00116 this.maxSize = extensionJson.optInt("max_size"); 00117 }
